articles.author: Nik Martin
articles.title: EU backs Somalia after Israel recognizes Somaliland - DW
articles.description: Israel’s support for Somaliland has triggered sharp pushback across Africa, the Middle East and beyond, with the EU urging calm and Somalia vowing to defend its sovereignty.
articles.content: The European Union on Saturday called for Somalias territorial integrity to be upheld after Israel became the first country to formally recognize the breakaway region of Somaliland as an independent … [+3049 chars]
